member.name: M:Corvus.Json.CodeGeneration.Generators.Draft7.CodeGeneratorConst.PatternPropertySuffix(Corvus.Json.CodeGeneration.Generators.Draft7.CodeGeneratorConst.PatternProperty)
member.summary: Gets the suffix to use for the pattern property.
member.param: The pattern property for which to determine the suffix.
member.returns: The suffix for the given property.
member.remarks: The suffix will be the index + 1 if there are multiple patterns that resolve to the same type. Otherwise, it will be the simple type name to which it resolves.

member.name: M:Corvus.Json.CodeGeneration.Generators.Draft7.CodeGeneratorPattern.PatternPropertySuffix(Corvus.Json.CodeGeneration.Generators.Draft7.CodeGeneratorPattern.PatternProperty)
member.summary: Gets the suffix to use for the pattern property.

member.summary: Gets the suffix to use for the pattern property.

member.summary: Gets the suffix to use for the pattern property.
